title: Premiere: Vinyl Jacket – Corona
body:
Having made their triumphant return at the Head of Steam in Newcastle at the tail end of last year, **Vinyl Jacket** explode into 2014 with new track, _Corona_.

As with their live set, it’s snappy, energetic, intelligent and deviously danceable . This is ready-made for the festival circuit, and yet another indication that these four Geordie lads are set for a hugely exciting year. Stream _Corona_ below, lifted from a forthcoming EP, and grab tickets for their next Newcastle gig on [24 Feb](https://www.facebook.com/events/244665015710216/).
